data.expected_result: It should scroll the channels page down
data.short_description: "NEW UNREADS" button stopping channels from being dragged
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you have Manage Channels so you can reorder them - Get an unread notification on a channel that you must scroll down to get to - Drag a channel and move it down and try to make it scroll down - Notice it doesn't
